name: mcp-server-manager
title: MCP Server Manager
description: Manage Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for AI editors like Cursor, Windsurf, and VS Code
author: rmncldyo

commands.name: list-mcp-servers
commands.title: List MCP Servers
commands.subtitle: MCP Server Manager
commands.description: View and manage MCP servers across editors

commands.name: add-mcp-server
commands.title: Add MCP Server
commands.subtitle: MCP Server Manager
commands.description: Add a new MCP server configuration

commands.name: search-mcp-servers
commands.title: Search MCP Servers
commands.subtitle: MCP Server Manager
commands.description: Search MCP servers across all editors

commands.name: view-raw-configs
commands.title: View Raw Configs
commands.subtitle: MCP Server Manager

scripts.test-and-run: ray lint --fix && npx tsc --noEmit && ray build && ray develop
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
